Class Doctor

java.lang.Object
hospital.Person
hospital.Doctor
public class Doctor extends Person
The hospital.Doctor class represents a medical professional who extends the hospital.Person class. It includes additional attributes and functionalities specific to a doctor, such as a unique doctor ID and the department they work in.

  • Field Details

    • doctorID

      public int doctorID
      Represents a unique identifier for a doctor. This ID is used to distinguish individual doctors within the system.

    • department

      public String department
      Represents the department in which the doctor is assigned. This variable is used to categorize the doctor's area of specialization and indicates the field of medicine they practice.

  • Constructor Details

    • Doctor

      public Doctor(int personID, String name, int age, String gender, String address, int contactDetails, int doctorID, String department)
      Constructs a new Doctor instance by extending the Person class and adding doctor-specific attributes.
      Parameters:
      personID - The unique identifier for the person.
      name - The name of the doctor.
      age - The age of the doctor.
      gender - The gender of the doctor.
      address - The address of the doctor.
      contactDetails - The contact details of the doctor.
      doctorID - The unique identifier associated with the doctor.
      department - The department in which the doctor is assigned.

  • Method Details

    • seePatientDetails

      public void seePatientDetails(int patientID)
      Displays the details of a patient based on their unique identifier.
      Parameters:
      patientID - The unique identifier of the patient whose details are to be retrieved and displayed.

    • prescribeTreatment

      public String prescribeTreatment(int patientID, String message)
      Prescribes treatment for a patient based on their unique identifier and a specified message.
      Parameters:
      patientID - The unique identifier of the patient for whom the treatment is prescribed.
      message - The message that details the prescribed treatment or instructions for the patient.
